messages.content: Analysis and then classify the item in JSON format, do not reply any extra explains: "URBZUE Hand Warmer, 10000 mAh USB Rechargeable and Digital Display, Electric Pocket Warmer with Multiple Heat Levels from 40-60 °C, Portable Warm Winter Gift for Women, Man, Children"
